description: 10. How else is the Ministry of Health protecting the Kenyan public?
title: 10. How else is the Ministry of Health protecting the Kenyan public?
content:
- The Ministry of Health in collaboration with partners like WHO and KEMRI has established procedures in place to ensure the safe transport and care of patients with Ebola disease.
 - The Ministry also has procured special protective clothing for health workers and other people who may handle potentially infected persons.
 - Drugs and other medical supplies are also being prepositioned in strategic regions of the Country.
